website_summaries.verdict: The Canon PowerShot SX60 HS has a lens that covers an extreme zoom range, and even though it's on the pricey side, it earns our Editors' Choice award.

customer_reviews.title: This camera is brilliant for taking travel photos - it is lighter
customer_reviews.text: This camera is brilliant for taking travel photos - it is lighter, less bulky than a full DSLR and you don't need to carry extra lenses. The 60 x optical zoom is great but you'll need to rest your arm on something when on maximum (I found the previous model SX50 zoom was enough). Have taken some shots in RAW format and used Canon editor which gave excellent results. Camera has many options so well worth reading the manual to get best results (or leave it on auto). Camera loses some quality in low light conditions so in this situation a DSLR camera will generally give better photos. See photos of the moon using zoom (taken 24th Feb 2018)
customer_reviews.author: RobWend

customer_reviews.title: best zoom I have used
customer_reviews.text: I have used different bridge cameras but none touch this one for the quality of photos, particularly when shooting in RAW. With JPEGS you will have to play more with the settings to keep sharpness and exposure right particularly at full zoom. I do a lot of wildlife photography and use this camera for distance and close up shots, also carrying a dslr with 400mm zoom for the action shots as no long zoom bridge is going to find its target for fast moving objects in time.
customer_reviews.author: eddie

customer_reviews.title: Badly let down by faulty zoom.
customer_reviews.text: Badly let down on holiday with this camera. I bought it specifically to take action photos at rodeos that I was going to in the USA. It worked well for a short while and then the zoom toggle became very stiff and I couldn't use the zoom smoothly at all and was unable to make fine adjustments. It eventually seized up altogether. Now back home and it appears to be working normally. I am wondering if it was affected by the hot weather,it was in the low 30sC but surely it should cope with that,it's not excessive.
customer_reviews.author: Wts121249

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: After using this for a few week , really getting to grips with its many functions , Great quality picture , so much better than the Panasonic 60x bridge camera in quality and performance , well pleased
customer_reviews.author: Coinshooter

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile lens range and easy to use so excellent for a beginner or someone ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought as present - very well received. Very versatile lens range and easy to use so excellent for a beginner or someone who wants to just carry one item rather than multiple lenses.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Barry

customer_reviews.title: Had to return it. Attempting to register with Canon ...
customer_reviews.text: Had to return it. Attempting to register with Canon for warranty etc the serial number was not recognised. One option is the product is from "grey" market and is not a UK version and so would not be covered by Canon. Have ordered same camera from a High St store instead
customer_reviews.author: SG62

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: What a great camera for me!! It takes great pictures, simple to use, fantastic zoom and has a lovely solid feel to it. I bought it for a special holiday in Australia and have returned with excellent pictures, particularly the hand held night shots which are of incredible for an amateur snapper like me. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: crabbo

customer_reviews.title: Great camera poor App support
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with camera. Amazing zoom lens. There is a problem with the suggested App which is annoying. Why a company as huge as Canon cannot provide a simple App that works is beyond me. This has affected my enjoyment when using this product.
customer_reviews.author: baz123

customer_reviews.title: For no professional travelers
customer_reviews.text: So happy with my purchase! For non professional travelers photographers is the best option.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria K

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly versatile
customer_reviews.text: See the composite pic above. The zoom range is absolutely astonishing. General performance is good, but don't push ISO or speed too hard as noise and poor colour rendition will result
customer_reviews.author: Lonesome Twin

customer_reviews.title: Good price. Fast delivery
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed. Good price. Fast delivery. Am still 'playing' with it at the moment but like what I have seen so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great all round camera
customer_reviews.text: Long lens and good performance. Everything you need in one box.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased with this camera, a tripod will be needed and I shall be selecting one to purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Splendid Super Zoom Bridge Camera
customer_reviews.text: Early days but all looks very good. Only slightly negative comment is that some with large fingers could find the function dial a bit "fiddly". Fortunaely my fingers are OK !

customer_reviews.title: ... made very quickly and the camera arrived in a perfect state and performs very well
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was made very quickly and the camera arrived in a perfect state and performs very well.

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic camera, lost a star for not having a user manual, very frustrating using the pdf version!

customer_reviews.text: Cracking camera. Really good for making videos. I bought it second hand but it was like brand new.

customer_reviews.title: Night shots a little grainy
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant camera Does exactly what it says on the tin It’s made me fall in love with photography Buy one 😀

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended.
customer_reviews.text: A Great piece of kit, just sold my Canon DSLR to go back to a Bridge and this is Ideal, the Zoom is Fantastic and it`s easy to use,GREAT.

customer_reviews.title: Snap happy chappy
customer_reviews.text: Superb camera. Upgraded from the SX40 to this; very happy.

customer_reviews.text: Wonderful camera. I have had so much fun with this. Perfect for identifying birds that are too far away to see even with binoculars. Take a picture on full zoom (you need a steady hand!) and magnify again in the review mode.

customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present and the wife is very pleased with it.

customer_reviews.text: Found it very. Easy too use ,great !! Just what I wanted .

customer_reviews.title: ... this camera for almost a year now and really love it. I use it as a compact surf ...
customer_reviews.text: Had this camera for almost a year now and really love it. I use it as a compact surf photography camera and even with my limited camera knowledge I can get some great shots!!

customer_reviews.title: A great camera for novice and expert alike
customer_reviews.text: Feature packed and user friendly. A great camera for novice and expert alike.

customer_reviews.title: Incredible camera!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased for an imbetweener for our iPhones and SLR - super happy with purchase. So easy to use and takes great shots.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing clear, precise shots, taken beautiful pictures, easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: Nice results and great zoom
customer_reviews.text: Nice results and great zoom. Shooting in low light was not as good as expected but ok. Overall satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Furqan Khan

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bridge camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bridge camera. Robust. Just what I was looking for. Provides good option between SLR and compact. Worth paying that little bit extra for quality. Will never use all the option available.
customer_reviews.author: coffee pot

customer_reviews.title: Tried many, this by far the most outstanding for performance, ease of use and results!
customer_reviews.text: Cannot believe just how good this camera is. Spent months looking at other options, but borrowed this model from a friend, and have to say ease of use, zoom ability, quality of results just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: David James

customer_reviews.title: Swings and roundabouts
customer_reviews.text: The USP of this camera is its huge zoom, but as with all cameras it's built to a price, which results in a lack of quality in other areas, particularly in the large amount of image smear, especially in lower light. So, it will be generally out-performed by similarly priced cameras without the ultrazoom. Another disappointment is that although it captures in RAW file, it does not do this in Auto mode.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hostick

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera is awesome and better even than my Nikon P600. Incredible results.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Sayer

customer_reviews.title: Very good value camera, impressive zoom feature.
customer_reviews.text: This was a replacement for my Canon SX 1IS which had developed a lens focusing problem, it has many similar features so was easy to understand how to use, there are many more features of it which I have yet to experiment with but I am very pleased with the quality of the photos it takes
customer_reviews.author: sallyt

customer_reviews.title: Grey import
customer_reviews.text: I discovered when I tried to register the camera with Canon that it was a grey import. This meant that I couldn’t register it and I couldn’t use some of the provide software. I am surprised that Amazon sell grey imports.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Burn

customer_reviews.title: SX60 HS great zoom
customer_reviews.text: I found the flexibility of this bridge camera with exceptional zoom lens very good. It does however need extra time to auto focus on occasions.
customer_reviews.author: Bob D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product --- fantastic photos and excellent zoom... To replace an older version of this same model series

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely brilliant what a difference a few extra megapixels make over the previous Powershot models.

customer_reviews.title: THE best bridge and with a PROPER fully articulating screen.
customer_reviews.text: THE best bridge on the market - and its screen is the ONLY truly fully articulating screen on any bridge camera despite what the others try to tell you. I have had several Canon cameras before, as well as other makes, and this upgrade from my SX50HS is every bit as amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark B.

customer_reviews.title: Execellent Camera
customer_reviews.text: Delivery arrangements perfect. Camera excellent just the job for good casual photography when it's not convenient to bring the full SLR equipment along.
customer_reviews.author: MR JOHN C S PERRY

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: An amazing camera, and so much easier to carry around than my other camera
customer_reviews.author: Jayne Dymond

customer_reviews.title: For my requirements, with my budget this camera has ...
customer_reviews.text: For my requirements, with my budget this camera has to date meet my needs. Not got to grip with all the features yet, but making use of the zoom.
customer_reviews.author: Mr S C Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Good camera
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the purchase, although I would have preferred fewer pixels (for example 12MP) as the image quality is a bit inferior to my 9 year old Panasonic DMC-FZ38. But the zoom is vastly superior, and Canon's software for RAW image processing is a class apart compared to Panasonic. Looking for a long zoom bridge camera and previously having owned and been happy with my Panasonic's DMC-FZ38 I first purchased the Panasonic DC-FZ82, but I promptly returned it as the image quality was just horrendous (despite having read good reviews about it).
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: excellent service
customer_reviews.text: Ordered on boxing day and camera arrived 10am next day as requested, excellent service. Product as described and excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb camera.
customer_reviews.text: This is a superb camera, very user friendly, very versatile.

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Love this camera. The zoom quality is amazing. So detailed.
customer_reviews.author: Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: This camera purchase is amazing. I saved over £100 against the retail outlet ...
customer_reviews.text: This camera purchase is amazing. I saved over £100 against the retail outlet prices in our locality. Quality of photographs excellent. I have been taking photos for many years, and have a few very good expensive cameras, this stands up to all of them.
customer_reviews.author: christopher .j .farley

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. A fantastic replacement for the SX40 I ...
customer_reviews.text: Great Camera. A fantastic replacement for the SX40 I had before. The autofocus is much better and the zoom is exactly what I needed. It does not give SLR quality pictures, but for a point and shoot and for the weight, it's brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: Vishal S Doshi

customer_reviews.title: Simply best in class
customer_reviews.text: As always Canon make a superb camera. Very easy to use nothing to touch it for price great zoom and although only 16mpixels produces high quality shots. Can be fired remotely via phone and is very quick to focus great for wildlife and sports
customer_reviews.author: Philip Harris

customer_reviews.title: OK.
customer_reviews.text: Handy little camera producing quite reasonable shots. shame about the electronic viewfinder which makes it a bit difficult, and sometimes unpleasant, to use. OK for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: Love it and can't wait to be able to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it and can't wait to be able to get my head round everything it does had it on auto and pics are fab
customer_reviews.author: d Lewtas

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, but............
customer_reviews.text: I thoroughly endorse the positive comments of most reviews , this is an incredible piece of kit and represents excellent value for money. I have two criticisms 1) The usual beef about the skinflint savings made by manufacturers in having the user manual only in electronic/digital form . Nobody, absolutely nobody believes the hogwash about environmental issues, it is a simple cost saving and a great inconvenience to customers . 2) WHY OH WHY did they not include the Stitch Assist mode .I used it a lot on the SX50 and was gutted to find it missing from The SX60. For these reasons I can only give 4stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Anthony Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera. There is a design flaw - you ...
customer_reviews.text: Great camera. There is a design flaw - you can not have the lens hood on and a filter at the same time!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chris Young

customer_reviews.title: ... so sent back for refund Build quality also seemed pretty flimsy to me Back to Nikon - forever
customer_reviews.text: Dead on Arrival so sent back for refund Build quality also seemed pretty flimsy to me Back to Nikon - forever!
customer_reviews.author: Poppy Willow

customer_reviews.title: Delivered 60 miles away and an awful product.
customer_reviews.text: What an absolute disaster. For the start my package was delivered to a post sorting office 60 miles away. I have no transport and spent 9 hours on buses retrieving my package. The product itself is dire. The minute I try and connect it to the WiFi the camera just shuts off. The photo quality is also dreadful. I was getting better shots out of a mobile 10 years ago. This item will now be returned and I shall purchase a zoom lens for my DSLR instead. Only if I was able to swear because after this experience it's very difficult not to.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes good quality, clear pictures
customer_reviews.text: There were fingerprints on lens?. No protective cover for LCD display screen. One of the leaflets was in Russian/ Arabic language - ? possibly this model was originally meant for this market. There is significant shake at extreme magnification. The batt/ card holder lid has a very insecure sounding clicking action. Takes good quality, clear pictures. Robust.
customer_reviews.author: Scotdoc

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic camera, Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: After much research,bought this for a present for my missus, what an absolutley awesome camera. The Zoom, clarity and images it captures are stunning,only just started playing with it. Does not come with a manual though,you download on line, and it is MAHOOOSIVE...so i need to spend time reading. It would be good if came with a quick guide. Also Trying to get internet connectivity is very confusing,and it appears as if you have to use Canon's site, it is not easy setting up, i wanted to cast straight from the camera to my pc or ipad. But in all fabulous.
customer_reviews.author: cold reader

customer_reviews.title: Did not buy this due to cost, but it ...
customer_reviews.text: Did not buy this due to cost(already have SX10 IS which i love,plus 2 other canons),,but it certainly ticks the boxes for me...comparing to Nikon P900,now there's a bridge camera!
customer_reviews.author: kawasakipete

customer_reviews.title: Not for night photography
customer_reviews.text: It is an absolutely great camera... for all the things I don't want it for. I was hoping to use this for night photography which it doesn't suit (despite being told it would be fine for it in a camera shop). If you're looking for a camera to take pictures at night, go for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Amazing cameras but had a couple of grains of sand ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing cameras but had a couple of grains of sand in my SX50 and had to write it off as no one would fix it, they even took the lens off but wouldn't blow it out or vac it out. Don't even know how it got in there but the moral of the story is don't get your camera any where near sand or you'll have to fork out for a new one just like me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Canon wi-fi app not compatible with Android Lollipop
customer_reviews.text: Beware if you are hoping to use the Wi-fi feature with an Android device. The Canon app does not work with Lollipop so you cannot connect the camera to your phone or tablet which runs Lollipop. That is a problem with all the Canon wi-fi capable cameras. Canon are aware of the problem (which has led to a lot of howling on their user forums) but seem to have no plans to address the issue
customer_reviews.author: Redmond B Gallagher

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I expected and the optical zoom was quite noisy at maximum zoom. I returned the camera.
customer_reviews.author: J. Rawcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Currently in South Africa on holiday with this camera and it is brilliant, easy to use, amazing zoom, excellent value
customer_reviews.author: andrew wood
